biotools.summary: BoundedCoalescent is a R package to simulate and compute the probability of phylogenies under the bounded coalescent model. This model is obtained by conditioning the standard coalescent so that the most recent ancestor of the whole sample occurs after a set date.

bioschemas.name: BoundedCoalescent
bioschemas.summary: BoundedCoalescent is a R package to simulate and compute the probability of phylogenies under the bounded coalescent model. This model is obtained by conditioning the standard coalescent so that the most recent ancestor of the whole sample occurs after a set date.
